2549.quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
2549.author: George Sand

2550.quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
2550.author: Euripides

2551.quote: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
2551.author: Bertrand Russell

2552.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
2552.author: Steve Jobs

2553.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
2553.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

2554.quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
2554.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

2555.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
2555.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

2556.quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
2556.author: Mother Teresa

2557.quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
2557.author: David Frost

2558.quote: Christmas is the perfect time to celebrate the love of God and family and to create memories that will last forever. Jesus is God's perfect, indescribable gift. The amazing thing is that not only are we able to receive this gift, but we are able to share it with others on Christmas and every other day of the year.
2558.author: Joel Osteen

2559.quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
2559.author: Ann Landers

2560.quote: Love myself I do. Not everything, but I love the good as well as the bad. I love my crazy lifestyle, and I love my hard discipline. I love my freedom of speech and the way my eyes get dark when I'm tired. I love that I have learned to trust people with my heart, even if it will get broken. I am proud of everything that I am and will become.
2560.author: Johnny Weir

2561.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
2561.author: Albert Schweitzer

2562.quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
2562.author: Oscar Wilde

2563.quote: The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.
2563.author: Audrey Hepburn

2564.quote: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
2564.author: Albert Einstein

2565.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
2565.author: Audrey Hepburn

2566.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
2566.author: Pele

2567.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
2567.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

2568.quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
2568.author: Bradley Whitford

2569.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
2569.author: Lao Tzu

2570.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
2570.author: Mother Teresa

2571.quote: Beauty is when you can appreciate yourself. When you love yourself, that's when you're most beautiful.
2571.author: Zoe Kravitz

2572.quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
2572.author: Loretta Young

2573.quote: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
2573.author: Henri Nouwen

2574.quote: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
2574.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

2575.quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
2575.author: Max Muller

2576.quote: I refuse to accept the view that mankind is so tragically bound to the starless midnight of racism and war that the bright daybreak of peace and brotherhood can never become a reality... I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word.
2576.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

2577.quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
2577.author: Confucius

2578.quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
2578.author: Erich Fromm

2579.quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
2579.author: Brad Henry

2580.quote: The spirit of Christmas is the spirit of love and of generosity and of goodness. It illuminates the picture window of the soul, and we look out upon the world's busy life and become more interested in people than in things.
2580.author: Thomas S. Monson

2581.quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
2581.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

2582.quote: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
2582.author: Jenn Proske

2583.quote: I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. That myth is more potent than history. That dreams are more powerful than facts. That hope always triumphs over experience. That laughter is the only cure for grief. And I believe that love is stronger than death.
2583.author: Robert Fulghum

2584.quote: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies.
2584.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

2585.quote: Nobody can predict the future. You just have to give your all to the relationship you're in and do your best to take care of your partner, communicate and give them every last drop of love you have. I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.
2585.author: Nick Cannon

2586.quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
2586.author: Orson Welles

2587.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
2587.author: William Shakespeare

2588.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
2588.author: Mignon McLaughlin

2589.quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
2589.author: Charles Kuralt

2590.quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
2590.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

2591.quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.
2591.author: Richard Bach

2592.quote: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.
2592.author: Bertrand Russell

2593.quote: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
2593.author: Leonardo da Vinci

2594.quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
2594.author: Denis Waitley

2595.quote: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy.
2595.author: Abhishek Bachchan

2596.quote: I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.
2596.author: Marilyn Monroe

2597.quote: If music be the food of love, play on.
2597.author: William Shakespeare

2598.quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
2598.author: Jimi Hendrix

2599.quote: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
2599.author: Jesus Christ

2600.quote: Red is such an interesting color to correlate with emotion, because it's on both ends of the spectrum. On one end you have happiness, falling in love, infatuation with someone, passion, all that. On the other end, you've got obsession, jealousy, danger, fear, anger and frustration.
2600.author: Taylor Swift

2601.quote: Where we love is home - home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
2601.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

2602.quote: Friends can help each other. A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself - and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to - letting a person be what he really is.
2602.author: Jim Morrison

2603.quote: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
2603.author: Brian Tracy

2604.quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.
2604.author: Sai Baba

2605.quote: True love stories never have endings.
2605.author: Richard Bach

2606.quote: But let there be spaces in your togetherness and let the winds of the heavens dance between you. Love one another but make not a bond of love: let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.
2606.author: Khalil Gibran

2607.quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
2607.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

2608.quote: The game of basketball has been everything to me. My place of refuge, place I've always gone where I needed comfort and peace. It's been the site of intense pain and the most intense feelings of joy and satisfaction. It's a relationship that has evolved over time, given me the greatest respect and love for the game.
2608.author: Michael Jordan

2609.quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.
2609.author: William Shakespeare

2610.quote: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
2610.author: Jennifer Aniston

2611.quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
2611.author: Rumi

2612.quote: There is no sincerer love than the love of food.
2612.author: George Bernard Shaw

2613.quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
2613.author: Maya Angelou

2614.quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
2614.author: Satchel Paige

2615.quote: There is pleasure in the pathless woods, there is rapture in the lonely shore, there is society where none intrudes, by the deep sea, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less, but Nature more.
2615.author: Lord Byron

2616.quote: The more often we see the things around us - even the beautiful and wonderful things - the more they become invisible to us. That is why we often take for granted the beauty of this world: the flowers, the trees, the birds, the clouds - even those we love. Because we see things so often, we see them less and less.
2616.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

2617.quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
2617.author: Douglas Adams

2618.quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
2618.author: Ernest Hemingway

2619.quote: It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve; and bad things are very easy to get.
2619.author: Confucius

2620.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
2620.author: Marcus Aurelius

2621.quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
2621.author: Lao Tzu

2622.quote: True love doesn't happen right away; it's an ever-growing process. It develops after you've gone through many ups and downs, when you've suffered together, cried together, laughed together.
2622.author: Ricardo Montalban

2623.quote: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else.
2623.author: John Keats

2624.quote: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
2624.author: Dalai Lama

2625.quote: There is a sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are the messengers of overwhelming grief, of deep contrition, and of unspeakable love.
2625.author: Washington Irving

2626.quote: Love is the ultimate expression of the will to live.
2626.author: Tom Wolfe

2627.quote: I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent - a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident - that is very sexy - but at the same time, he's very kind to people.
2627.author: Nicole Scherzinger

2628.quote: Love is a hole in the heart.
2628.author: Ben Hecht

2629.quote: Love is all we have, the only way that each can help the other.
2629.author: Euripides

2630.quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
2630.author: John Ruskin

2631.quote: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.
2631.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

2632.quote: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.
2632.author: Robert A. Heinlein

2633.quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
2633.author: Paul Sweeney

2634.quote: My brothers and sisters, true love is a reflection of the Savior's love. In December of each year we call it the Christmas spirit. You can hear it. You can see it. You can feel it.
2634.author: Thomas S. Monson

2635.quote: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
2635.author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

2636.quote: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.
2636.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

2637.quote: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
2637.author: Stevie Wonder

2638.quote: Love who you are, embrace who you are. Love yourself. When you love yourself, people can kind of pick up on that: they can see confidence, they can see self-esteem, and naturally, people gravitate towards you.
2638.author: Lilly Singh

2639.quote: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than you love yourself.
2639.author: Josh Billings

2640.quote: You can never control who you fall in love with, even when you're in the most sad, confused time of your life. You don't fall in love with people because they're fun. It just happens.
2640.author: Kirsten Dunst

2641.quote: Never go on trips with anyone you do not love.
2641.author: Ernest Hemingway

2642.quote: Love begins by taking care of the closest ones - the ones at home.
2642.author: Mother Teresa

2643.quote: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
2643.author: Ferdinand Foch

2644.quote: Don't let fear or insecurity stop you from trying new things. Believe in yourself. Do what you love. And most importantly, be kind to others, even if you don't like them.
2644.author: Stacy London

2645.quote: Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent then the one derived from fear of punishment.
2645.author: Mahatma Gandhi

2646.quote: We've got this gift of love, but love is like a precious plant. You can't just accept it and leave it in the cupboard or just think it's going to get on by itself. You've got to keep watering it. You've got to really look after it and nurture it.
2646.author: John Lennon

2647.quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
2647.author: Buddha

2648.quote: Feelings aroused by the touch of someone's hand, the sound of music, the smell of a flower, a beautiful sunset, a work of art, love, laughter, hope and faith - all work on both the unconscious and the conscious aspects of the self, and they have physiological consequences as well.
2648.author: Bernie Siegel

2649.quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
2649.author: Virginia Woolf

2650.quote: Forgiveness is the final form of love.
2650.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

2651.quote: Sex without love is a meaningless experience, but as far as meaningless experiences go its pretty damn good.
2651.author: Woody Allen

2652.quote: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.
2652.author: Carl Sagan

2653.quote: We, the People, recognize that we have responsibilities as well as rights; that our destinies are bound together; that a freedom which only asks what's in it for me, a freedom without a commitment to others, a freedom without love or charity or duty or patriotism, is unworthy of our founding ideals, and those who died in their defense.
2653.author: Barack Obama

2654.quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
2654.author: Maya Angelou

2655.quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire, Doubt that the sun doth move. Doubt truth to be a liar, But never doubt I love.
2655.author: William Shakespeare

2656.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
2656.author: Aristotle

2657.quote: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
2657.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

2658.quote: I love the feeling of the fresh air on my face and the wind blowing through my hair.
2658.author: Evel Knievel

2659.quote: Until you have a son of your own... you will never know the joy, the love beyond feeling that resonates in the heart of a father as he looks upon his son.
2659.author: Kent Nerburn

2660.quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
2660.author: Bruce Lee

2661.quote: More than kisses, letters mingle souls.
2661.author: John Donne

2662.quote: People love me. And you know what, I have been very successful. Everybody loves me.
2662.author: Donald Trump

2663.quote: I love spending time with my friends and family. The simplest things in life give me the most pleasure: cooking a good meal, enjoying my friends.
2663.author: Cindy Morgan

2664.quote: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
2664.author: Julia Child

2665.quote: Don't ever criticize yourself. Don't go around all day long thinking, 'I'm unattractive, I'm slow, I'm not as smart as my brother.' God wasn't having a bad day when he made you... If you don't love yourself in the right way, you can't love your neighbour. You can't be as good as you are supposed to be.
2665.author: Joel Osteen

2666.quote: The things that we love tell us what we are.
2666.author: Thomas Aquinas

2667.quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don't, they never were.
2667.author: Khalil Gibran

2668.quote: I say what I want to say and do what I want to do. There's no in between. People will either love you for it or hate you for it.
2668.author: Eminem

2669.quote: Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence.
2669.author: Henry David Thoreau

2670.quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
2670.author: Rumi

2671.quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
2671.author: Ingrid Bergman

2672.quote: I love Thanksgiving because it's a holiday that is centered around food and family, two things that are of utmost importance to me.
2672.author: Marcus Samuelsson

2673.quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
2673.author: John Wooden

2675.quote: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.
2675.author: Al Lopez

2676.quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
2676.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

2677.quote: Today I begin to understand what love must be, if it exists... When we are parted, we each feel the lack of the other half of ourselves. We are incomplete like a book in two volumes of which the first has been lost. That is what I imagine love to be: incompleteness in absence.
2677.author: Edmond de Goncourt

2678.quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.
2678.author: Jean de La Fontaine

2679.quote: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.
2679.author: Joyce Giraud

2680.quote: Thousands have lived without love, not one without water.
2680.author: W. H. Auden

2681.quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
2681.author: Rumi

2682.quote: Anyway, no drug, not even alcohol, causes the fundamental ills of society. If we're looking for the source of our troubles, we shouldn't test people for drugs, we should test them for stupidity, ignorance, greed and love of power.
2682.author: P. J. O'Rourke

2683.quote: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
2683.author: Dale Evans

2684.quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
2684.author: Victor Hugo

2685.quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
2685.author: William Shakespeare

2686.quote: A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.
2686.author: Saint Basil

2687.quote: Liza, I love you more than any words can say. You have made me a complete person. You are everything to me. And I cannot think of living life without you. And I love you forever.
2687.author: David Gest

2688.quote: Love is a really scary thing, and you never know what's going to happen. It's one of the most beautiful things in life, but it's one of the most terrifying. It's worth the fear because you have more knowledge, experience, you learn from people, and you have memories.
2688.author: Ariana Grande

2689.quote: I'm just not into trying to convince people like me. I always say to myself, 'It is what it is.' I walk into a situation knowing that people are either going to love me or they're not, and that's OK. I'm just going to be me. You can't be everything to everyone.
2689.author: NeNe Leakes

2690.quote: I love everything that's old, - old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine.
2690.author: Oliver Goldsmith

2691.quote: God wants us to know that life is a series of beginnings, not endings. Just as graduations are not terminations, but commencements. Creation is an ongoing process, and when we create a perfect world where love and compassion are shared by all, suffering will cease.
2691.author: Bernie Siegel

2692.quote: We never know the love of a parent till we become parents ourselves.
2692.author: Henry Ward Beecher

2693.quote: Winners embrace hard work. They love the discipline of it, the trade-off they're making to win. Losers, on the other hand, see it as punishment. And that's the difference.
2693.author: Lou Holtz

2694.quote: A grateful heart is a beginning of greatness. It is an expression of humility. It is a foundation for the development of such virtues as prayer, faith, courage, contentment, happiness, love, and well-being.
2694.author: James E. Faust

2695.quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
2695.author: Lucille Ball

2696.quote: But I say to you, Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you, so that you may be sons of your Father who is in heaven; for he makes his sun rise on the evil and on the good, and sends rain on the just and on the unjust.
2696.author: Jesus Christ

2697.quote: Never make your home in a place. Make a home for yourself inside your own head. You'll find what you need to furnish it - memory, friends you can trust, love of learning, and other such things. That way it will go with you wherever you journey.
2697.author: Tad Williams

2698.quote: Being a father has been, without a doubt, my greatest source of achievement, pride and inspiration. Fatherhood has taught me about unconditional love, reinforced the importance of giving back and taught me how to be a better person.
2698.author: Naveen Jain

2699.quote: To all the other dreamers out there, don't ever stop or let the world's negativity disenchant you or your spirit. If you surround yourself with love and the right people, anything is possible.
2699.author: Adam Green

2700.quote: You give loyalty, you'll get it back. You give love, you'll get it back.
2700.author: Tommy Lasorda

2701.quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
2701.author: Mother Teresa

2702.quote: I love shopping; I'm a jeans and a T-shirt kind of girl, but I go classy when I dress up - with a little bit of sexy.
2702.author: Adrianne Palicki

2703.quote: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may not touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.
2703.author: Helen Keller

2704.quote: If your heart is a volcano, how shall you expect flowers to bloom?
2704.author: Khalil Gibran

2705.quote: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone, and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom, for it is only when he is alone that he is really free.
2705.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

2706.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness, of hatred, of jealousy, and, most easily of all, the gate of fear.
2706.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

2707.quote: I love Halloween, trick or treating and decorating the house. And I love Thanksgiving, because of the football and the fall weather. And of course, I love Christmas - that's my favorite of all!
2707.author: Joe Nichols

2708.quote: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.
2708.author: Morihei Ueshiba

2709.quote: Through Love all that is bitter will be sweet, Through Love all that is copper will be gold, Through Love all dregs will become wine, through Love all pain will turn to medicine.
2709.author: Rumi

2710.quote: If we're destroying our trees and destroying our environment and hurting animals and hurting one another and all that stuff, there's got to be a very powerful energy to fight that. I think we need more love in the world. We need more kindness, more compassion, more joy, more laughter. I definitely want to contribute to that.
2710.author: Ellen DeGeneres

2711.quote: Unconditional love really exists in each of us. It is part of our deep inner being. It is not so much an active emotion as a state of being. It's not 'I love you' for this or that reason, not 'I love you if you love me.' It's love for no reason, love without an object.
2711.author: Ram Dass

2712.quote: Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.
2712.author: Michael Jackson

2713.quote: Down on your knees, and thank heaven, fasting, for a good man's love.
2713.author: Euripides

2714.quote: Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
2714.author: George Eliot

2715.quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
2715.author: Mother Teresa

2716.quote: We are born of love; Love is our mother.
2716.author: Rumi

2717.quote: Love planted a rose, and the world turned sweet.
2717.author: Katharine Lee Bates

2718.quote: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.
2718.author: William Blake

2719.quote: I spent a lot of years trying to outrun or outsmart vulnerability by making things certain and definite, black and white, good and bad. My inability to lean into the discomfort of vulnerability limited the fullness of those important experiences that are wrought with uncertainty: Love, belonging, trust, joy, and creativity to name a few.
2719.author: Brene Brown

2720.quote: Presents don't really mean much to me. I don't want to sound mawkish, but - it was the realization that I have a great many people in my life who really love me, and who I really love.
2720.author: Gabriel Byrne

2721.quote: The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.
2721.author: Thomas Merton

2722.quote: If having a soul means being able to feel love and loyalty and gratitude, then animals are better off than a lot of humans.
2722.author: James Herriot

2723.quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
2723.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

2724.quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
2724.author: Bruce Lee

2725.quote: Some think love can be measured by the amount of butterflies in their tummy. Others think love can be measured in bunches of flowers, or by using the words 'for ever.' But love can only truly be measured by actions. It can be a small thing, such as peeling an orange for a person you love because you know they don't like doing it.
2725.author: Marian Keyes

2726.quote: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
2726.author: Arthur Rubinstein

2727.quote: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
2727.author: Sophia Loren

2728.quote: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.
2728.author: Andy Serkis

2729.quote: True love is not a strong, fiery, impetuous passion. It is, on the contrary, an element calm and deep. It looks beyond mere externals, and is attracted by qualities alone. It is wise and discriminating, and its devotion is real and abiding.
2729.author: Ellen G. White

2730.quote: Love begins at home, and it is not how much we do... but how much love we put in that action.
2730.author: Mother Teresa
